text: Sunan Abu Dawood () is one of the Kutub al-Sittah (six major hadith collections). It was collected by Abu Dawood. Sunnis regard this collection as fourth in strength of their six major hadith collections. == Details == Abu Dawud collected 500,000 hadith, but included only 4,800 in this collection. It took Abu Dawood 20 years to collect the hadiths. == References == Category:Hadith Category:Hadith Books
title: Sunan Abu Dawood
